body.section: Download and install required JDK1.5 and other dependencies. Please follow the instructions from Prerequisites and Installation sections

section.name: Downloads
section.p:
All sources are available for anonymous checkout from SVN repository: # Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP. svn checkout http://krank.googlecode.com/svn/crank-codegen/ krank-read-only # Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://krank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ krank-read-only
